comment: Who is the patron saint of smartphones ? Managed to immerse mine in water . It's in rice , in the airing cupboard , but it will be March before I can afford a replacement ! My life is about to become v complicated !
amr:
# ::snt Who is the patron saint of smartphones ? Managed to immerse mine in water . It's in rice , in the airing cupboard , but it will be March before I can afford a replacement ! My life is about to become v complicated !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / saint
            :mod (p / patron)
            :topic (s2 / smartphone)
            :domain (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (m2 / Manage-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (ii2 / immerse-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG2 (w / water)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (ii4 / it
                  :location (r / rice))
            :ARG2 (b / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 ii4
                  :ARG2 (c2 / cupboard
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / air-01))))
      :ARG2 (p2 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a3 / afford-01
                  :ARG0 (ii5 / i)
                  :ARG1 (r2 / replace-01
                        :ARG1 ii4))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 3))
      :snt4 (b2 / become-01
            :ARG1 (l / life
                  :poss (ii6 / i))
            :ARG2 (c3 / complicate-01
                  :ARG1 l)
            :time (a4 / about-to)))
